page.title: 06W. Buckfastleigh Employment
page.content:
Most working people in the area are concerned in some way with {agriculture,}either as farmers, smallholders or farm labourers. We also found a man who teaches people how to drive a pony and trap, and heard of one who produces 1200 gallons of cider a year for sale to local pubs. Many others work outside the area, mostly in Buckfastleigh, although we did hear of a secretary who works as far away as Plymouth.
There is also a high proportion of retired people living in the area.
